job_tasks.phrase: Create and improve autonomous support platforms using LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building and enhancing software systems (platforms) that leverage LLMs, fitting the definition of integrating AI features into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: This includes not only development but also troubleshooting, maintaining, and updating tools based on user feedback and support tickets.
job_tasks.justification: These are standard software engineering tasks related to the lifecycle of a product, including maintenance and updates based on feedback.

job_tasks.phrase: One example would be creating an assistant able to guide customers through an upgrade process.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a specific software feature (an assistant) to guide users, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Test and integrate state-of-the-art AI technologies, like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer
job_tasks.justification: 'Test and integrate' are core software engineering activities. The technologies being integrated are AI, but the task itself is integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and enhance the performance and integration of AI solutions across different infrastructures, notably AWS
job_tasks.justification: 'Evaluate and enhance performance and integration' are software engineering tasks. 'Across different infrastructures' points to integration and deployment aspects.

job_tasks.phrase: ensures support is available for end-users experiencing issues, focusing on maintaining high service quality and satisfaction.
job_tasks.justification: This describes maintaining the service and supporting end-users, which falls under software maintenance and operations, part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve support for both internal and external clients, significantly boosting the company's innovation capacity and service quality
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the business outcome and strategic goal of the role, aligning technical work with business objectives.

soft_skills.phrase: providing support and guidance for internal teams on how to best utilize these technologies within their workflows.
forward-thinking developer eager to harness the power of GenAI to redefine business standards and enhance productivity
bored of solving the same customer support tickets or resolving the same bugs over and over again

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as creating and improving platforms, development, troubleshooting, maintenance, updating tools, testing, and integration. While it explicitly mentions using LLMs and specific AI technologies like GPT-4 Vision and Amazon CodeWhisperer, the core responsibilities revolve around building and integrating these technologies into existing systems and supporting end-users. There is no significant mention of core model development, fine-tuning, or deep research into AI algorithms, which would be characteristic of a Core GenAI Engineer or GenAI Specialist. The role focuses on the engineering and integration of AI features into software products, fitting the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear, detailed, and directly describes the responsibilities and technologies involved, allowing for a confident classification.
